ViewObject.Name: LovMonthVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT 1 AS MON_ID, 'JANUARY' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 2 AS MON_ID, 'FEBRUARY' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 3 AS MON_ID, 'MARCH' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 4 MON_ID, 'APRIL' FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 5 MON_ID, 'MAY' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 6 MON_ID, 'JUNE' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 7 MON_ID, 'JULY' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 8 MON_ID, 'AUGUST' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 9 MON_ID, 'SEPTEMBER' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 10 MON_ID, 'OCTOBER' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 11 MON_ID, 'NOVEMBER' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 12 MON_ID, 'DECEMBER' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
